sentences.en: A homing pigeon was sent forth to carry the message.
sentences.cn: 一只信鸽被放出去递送消息.

sentences.en: A pigeon emerges, wings flapping noisily, from the tower.
sentences.cn: 一只鸽子从塔里钻出来，扑扑地拍打着翅膀。

sentences.en: A pigeon strutted along the roof, cooing rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 一只鸽子沿着屋顶大摇大摆地走, 有节奏地咕咕叫.

sentences.en: A pigeon was cooing up in one of the elms.
sentences.cn: 一只鸽子在榆树上咕咕地叫.

sentences.en: Above all, if you see an accident about to happen, on the road or in business, honk like a wild goose rather than cooing like a pet pigeon.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是，如果眼见事故就要发生，无论是在开车还是在公司，一定要学野鹅那样大声叫出来，千万别像鸽子似的小声嘀咕。

sentences.en: As the name implies, pigeon is an awkward pose, and it happens to be the most challenging for me.
sentences.cn: 顾名思义，鸽子式是一个很棘手的姿势，它对于我来说是最有挑战性的。

sentences.en: Because I had an unusual accent people were not able to put me into a pigeon-hole.
sentences.cn: 因为我与众不同的口音，人们无法把我归入任何一类。

sentences.en: Before I could get the pigeon the cat pounced.
sentences.cn: 未等我逮到鸽子，猫就猛扑了上去。

sentences.en: Cambridge had called; he had responded like a homing pigeon.
sentences.cn: 剑桥发出了召唤, 他象一只归来的信鸽似的作出响应.

sentences.en: He was a pigeon , a victim of a confidence game.
sentences.cn: 他上当受骗了.

sentences.en: Her head rested on his shoulder, the pleasant smell of her hair conquering the pigeon dung.
sentences.cn: 她的头偎在他肩上, 头发的香味盖住了鸽屎臭.

sentences.en: I don't care where the money comes from — that's not my pigeon.
sentences.cn: 我不管钱从哪儿来,那不是我的事.

sentences.en: I have heard of one old witch changing herself into a pigeon.
sentences.cn: 我听说有个老巫婆把自己变成了一只鸽子.

sentences.en: I won't stop you coming in, but it's your pigeon then.
sentences.cn: 我并不阻止你们搬进来, 可是以后就是你们的责任了.

sentences.en: Many journalists here choose to pigeon all but the most innocuous of stories.
sentences.cn: 除了平淡乏味的报道，这儿的新闻记者将一切通过鸽子传递出去。

sentences.en: One blue pigeon sitting on a wall.
sentences.cn: 一只蓝色的鸽子蹲坐在一堵墙上。

sentences.en: Start slow with forward bends and calf stretches, move on to pigeon pose and plow at the end.
sentences.cn: 开始时缓慢的前倾伸展和小腿伸展，然后摆出鸽子的姿势再是犁头的姿势。

sentences.en: The passenger pigeon is extinct.
sentences.cn: 旅鸽已绝种.

sentences.en: The pigeon homed from a distance of 100 miles.
sentences.cn: 鸽子从百英里之外返回窝巢.

sentences.en: the sound of pigeons cooing
sentences.cn: 鸽子咕咕的叫声

sentences.en: They are all descended from the rock - pigeon.
sentences.cn: 它们都是从野岩鸽传衍而来.

trans.tran_en: a grey bird with short legs that is common in cities
